column4: Tourism;Preah Sihanouk province:------ Three tourists were lucky to escape reasonably unharmed from a lightning strike.------The incident occurred on the morning of May 27
column7: in Thma Thkau village.------The lightning also hit a large wooden pole
column8: which may have protected the 3 white men from the full impact (*details are a bit sketchy). After the incident one man briefly lost consciousness
column9: but came round.------The three were sent to the mainland and were found to be in good health
column10: if a little shocked.------One of the men seems to be suffering from some amnesia.
